General.Name: Jiangshan Oupai Door Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangshan Oupai Door Industry Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, processing, sale, and service of wooden doors in China and internationally. The company also offers solid wood composite doors, plywood molded doors, and gradually extended to fire doors, entry doors, cabinets, and other new products. It also exports its products. Jiangshan Oupai Door Industry Co., Ltd was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jiangshan, China.
General.Address: No. 8, Yudashan Natural Village, Jiangshan, China, 324100

1.Name: Ms. Shui Yan  Wu
1.Title: Head of Fin., Deputy GM & Director
